predicate.note: Frames file for 'man' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: act as staff for, work at (place)

example.name: no longer PC
example.text: He manned the UAL post yesterday with Christopher Bates, 33, an energetic Long Islander who's a dead ringer for actor Nicolas Cage.
example.arg: with Christopher Bates, 33, an energetic Long Islander who's a dead ringer for actor Nicolas Cage

roleset.note: 'Work' suggests an arg3 'coworker', but I don't think that's appropriate here. To 'work with' someone is quite different from to 'man with'--the latter is much more adjuncty.
